name: nasa-fe

scripts.build: echo [1] Starting build... && react-scripts build && echo [2] Build finished. Checking and removing ../server/public if it exists... && if exist ..\server\public ( echo [3] Found ../server/public - Deleting... && rmdir /s /q ..\server\public ) else ( echo [3] ../server/public not found - skipping delete ) && echo [4] Now moving build to ../server/public... && move build ..\server\public && echo [5] ✅ Build folder moved to ../server/public
scripts.build:linux: echo '[1] Starting build...' && react-scripts build && echo '[2] Build finished. Checking and removing ../server/public if it exists...' && if [ -d ../server/public ]; then echo '[3] Found ../server/public - Deleting...' && rm -rf ../server/public; else echo '[3] ../server/public not found - skipping delete'; fi && echo '[4] Now moving build to ../server/public...' && mv build ../server/public && echo '[5] ✅ Build folder moved to ../server/public'

description: This project was bootstrapped with [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app).
